page.title: 09TROON Cornwall - Transport
page.content: As a growing number of the community in TROON is elderly, they rely very much on public transport. This is provided by a good bus service to various villages around TROON and regular buses to Camborne, the nearest shopping centre, and also buses to Falmouth and Redruth. There is also a good taxi service from a firm based within the village. For those in the village with cars there is a garage offering servicing facilities, but no filling station. Outside the village however a car is essential as the bus routes only cover the one main road through the area. Many of the surronding farmers still use horse drawn carts and the local blacksmith has no other means of transport.
